rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0001
rows.name:
So you guys are like, Driver and Blade,
right? Like, partners in battle and stuff?

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0002
rows.name:
How well do you actually
get along, though?

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently if you feel a really strong
Affinity with each other during battle,
it lets you use some amazing attacks!

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But if you're really not feeling it,
your Blade might not even be able
to support you properly.

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Me and Si√†n, we'd have no problem,
'cos we get along great! But I guess
it's not that easy for everyone.
